page.title: 14** FAVOURITE TOYS - GIRLS **
page.content: {SOME FAVOURITE TOYS FOR GIRLS IN 1985 SOME NEW TOYS HAVE COME OUT SINCE 84 TO 85 LIKE "FLOWER FAIRIES", THEY ARE LITTLE DOLLS DRESSED AS A FAIRIE AND GIRLS "GOLDEN GIRL" DOLLS THEY ARE A DOLL DRESSED IN GOLD AND "CHARMKINS" ARE OTHER DOLLS BUT YOU CAN WEAR THEM ANYWHERE, THEY ARE 1 INCH AND THEY ARE TINY. LITTLE GAMES HAVE COME OUT CALLED "MAJOR-ORGAN" AND "SPEAK AND SPELL" THEY ARE COMPUTER GAMES THAT TALK, MAKE MUSIC AND ARE GOOD TO PLAY WITH. SOME NEW DOLLS HAVE COME OUT AGAIN COMPUTER DOLLS THAT TALK, CRY, LAUGH AND MAKE FUNNY NOISES. "CABBAGE PATCH" DOLLS HAVE COME OUT THEY HAVE ALL KINDS OF COLOURS OF HAIR AND YOU CAN TREAT THEM LIKE A REAL BABY. CHILDREN HAVE FUN WITH THEM AT HOME WITH MUMS AND DADS. {BY LOUISE BROWNRIDGE AGED 9, ST. {GREGORYS PRIMARY SCHOOL.
